text.name: function_baleGrab
text.text: With a bale grab you can grab square bales quickly and easily.

text.name: function_comprima
text.text: A baler turns loose straw, grass or hay into convenient bales. The Comprima can press bales in different sizes between 1,10m and 1,80m. ATTENTION: many tools in the game are only compatible to 1,30m bales.

text.name: function_baleCollect
text.text: Attach the Krone BaleCollect to the Krone BiGPack 1290 HDP II XC to collect 3 bales and unload them side by side.

text.name: warning_needsABaleTrailer
text.text: In this configuration the baler can only be used in combination with the bale trailer!

text.name: function_premos
text.text: This machine can pelletize straw and hay right on the field. Attached to the concept bale shredder, it can also be used stationary.

text.name: function_baleShredder
text.text: Attach the bale shredder to the Premos 5000 to shred bales and pelletize the material. Bale shredder can be attached to the Premos front right side in driving, check that the yellow arrow on the pallet is pointing towards the Premos.

text.name: warning_firstFoldTheTool
text.text: You first need to fold the tool (%s)!

text.name: function_pelletHall
text.text: Here you can store straw pellets and hay pellets. Use the palletizer to put the pellets into bags and stack them on pallets. With the crane, it is easy to fill the palletizer.

text.name: function_pelletHall_crane
text.text: Here you can store straw pellets and hay pellets. With the crane, it is easy to fill your machinery.

text.name: function_pelletHall_empty
text.text: Here you can store bales and bulk material or park your vehicles.

text.name: function_palletSellPoint
text.text: Here you can sell the pellet pallets for a higher price than as bulk material.

text.name: notification_palletizer_refilled
text.text: Palletizer refilled with %d bags due to saving/sync

text.name: statistics_palletizer_bags
text.text: Todays output until now: %d bags, %d pallets

text.name: function_baleTwinePallet
text.text: With the twine roles you can refill the Krone BigPack 1290 HDP II XC.

text.name: function_netRolePallet
text.text: With the net roles you can refill the Krone Comprima V 180 XC.

text.name: function_molassesPallet
text.text: With the canisters you can refill the molasses tank of the Krone Premos 5000.

text.name: warning_baleTooSmall
text.text: The next bale size %.2f is too small for the current fill level

text.name: strawHarvest_message_failedHeightTypes
text.text: Straw Harvest was unable to load on the selected map: the map in combination with the active mods is not compatible with Straw Harvest. (too many fruits on the ground)
